units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S5U04 — Particle model: solids, liquids, gases

units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S5U02 — Earth surface processes

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S4U02 — Interdependence & environments
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y4 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Waste Management Technician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Chemical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Wildlife Carer
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
